#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,i,j;
	char a[111];
	char b[111];
	cin >> t;
	int flag;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin >> a >> b;
		
		if(strlen(a) < strlen(b))
			flag = 0;
		i=0;
		j=0;
		while(b[i] != '\0')
		{
			while(a[j] != '\0')
			{
				if(a[j] == b[i])
					break;
				j++;
			}
			if(a[j] == '\0')
			{
				flag = 0;
				break;
			}
			j++;
			i++;
		}
		if(b[i] == '\0')
			flag = 1;
		
		i=0;	
		j = strlen(a)-1;
		while(b[i] != '\0')
		{
			while(j >= 0)
			{
				if(a[j] == b[i])
					break;
				j--;
			}
			if(j == -1)
			{
				break;
			}
			i++;
			j--;
		}
		if(b[i] == '\0')
		{
			if(flag)
				flag = 3;
			else 
				flag = 2;
		}
		cout << flag << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
